--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Roger Smith <rog_21@y...> wrote:
> I am interested in how NN can be used with GA,GP in
> evolve real-time decision making bots.
> I look forward to reading the messages from this group
> and getting involved in some meaningful way.
> Thanks,
> Rog
> 

Hi Rog, have you seen the demos at:

http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/kstanley/demos.html

They show simulated bots that word evolved for real-time
decision making.  This is definitely an interesting
area with a lot of room for progress.

ken
